info.title: IP Address Geolocation
info.description: This API returns the location of an IP address (country, region, city, zipcode, latitude and longitude) and the associated timezone in JSON or XML format.

get.description: Returns the location of an IP address (country, region, city, zipcode, latitude and longitude) and the associated timezone in JSON or XML format.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: It supports json and xml response format.

parameters.name: ip
parameters.description: IP Address. It supports both IPv4 and IPv6 address format.
